channel.title: Paysite My review (really works)
channel.description:
This as to be one of the best paysites ive found. They actually pay you money. HOW IT WORKS: You click on an ad in surf ads. wait 30 seconds, then get payed 1 cent. Also if you have refferals what ever they get you get too. For example if 1 refferal did 1 ad he got 1 cent and so would you. The best part about this is that it pays directly to your paypal! I highly recommend this site and it does pay if you want proof go here: http://adbux.org/forums/showthread.php?t=648
Click the banner to go to site! [url=http://adbux.org/] [img]http://img256.imageshack.us/img256/1674/adbuxanimationpm3.gif[/img] [/url]
Another great paysite its like the exact same thing but different url!: [url=http://bux.to/][img]http://bux.to/images/banner/banner.png[/img][/url] EDIT: If possible please move to Tutorials tips and tricks.
